name: Cane Hill
description:
'''Cane Hill''' is an American [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band formed in [[New Orleans, Louisiana]], in 2011. The band consists of vocalist Elijah Witt, guitarist James Barnett, bassist Ryan Henriquez, and drummer Devin Clark.

In 2015, the band signed to [[Rise Records]], releasing their debut self-titled EP, ''Cane Hill''. In 2016, the band released their debut full-length studio album, ''[[Smile (Cane Hill album)|Smile]]''. On January 19, 2018, their sophomore album ''[[Too Far Gone (Cane Hill album)|Too Far Gone]]'', was released, again via Rise Records. ''Too Far Gone'' was critically acclaimed, featuring the singles "Too Far Gone, "It Follows", "Lord of Flies" and "10Â¢". In late 2019, the band left Rise Records and became independent.

As of 2024, the band has released three studio albums: ''[[Smile (Cane Hill album)|Smile]]'' (2016), ''[[Too Far Gone (Cane Hill album)|Too Far Gone]]'' (2018) and ''[[A Piece of Me I Never Let You Find]]'' (2024) and four EPs: ''[[Cane Hill (EP)|Cane Hill]]'' (2014), ''[[Kill the Sun (EP)|Kill the Sun]]'' (2019), ''Krewe de la Mort, Vol. 1'' (2021) and ''Krewe D'Amour, Vol. 2'' (2022).

Cane Hill released their third album, ''[[A Piece of Me I Never Let You Find]]'' on November 1, 2024.
